original_text: Jehoiada the priest took a large box and he made a hole in the top of it. He put it outside the entrance of the temple, on the right side of the altar. The priests who were guards at the temple door took care of the box. When people brought gifts of money to the Lord's temple, the priests put the money in the box.
korean_text: 제사장 여호야다가 한 궤를 가져다가 그것의 뚜껑에 구멍을 뚫어 여호와의 전문 어귀 오른쪽 곧 제단 옆에 두매 여호와의 성전에 가져 오는 모든 은을 다 문을 지키는 제사장들이 그 궤에 넣더라

sentences.original_text: Jehoiada the priest took a large box
and he made a hole in the top of it
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 그 상자 꼭대기에 구멍을 뚫었습니다

sentences.original_text: He put it outside the entrance of the temple
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그것을 성전 입구 바깥에 두었습니다

sentences.original_text: on the right side of the altar
The priests who were guards at the temple door
When people brought gifts of money
the priests put the money in the box
